title: Where's My Water? v1.4.1 (Fully Unlocked)
description:
Where's My Water? v1.4.1 (Fully Unlocked)
Requirements: Android version 2.1 and higher
Overview: Swampy the Alligator lives under the city and yearns for a more human-like existence. He is especially fond of cleanliness. Cranky and the other gators do not take kindly to SwampyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s eccentricities and have conspired to sabotage SwampyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s water supply. Help Swampy by guiding water to his shower to fill up his tub! 

 WhereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s My Water? is a challenging physics-based puzzler complete with Retina display graphics, Multi-Touch controls, and a sensational soundtrack. To be successful, you need to be clever and keep an eye out for algae, toxic ooze, triggers, and traps. 

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ NOW WITH OVER 140 CHALLENGING PUZZLES! 
The fun is just beginning. SwampyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s pipes are broken and it is up to you to get the water flowing again through 7 themed chapters, each with 20 challenging levels. Keep playing! New levels are added regularly! 

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ MEET SWAMPY! 
The story of Swampy unfolds as you play. SwampyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s cute, heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s funny, he just wants to take a shower with his beloved rubber ducky. You will also meet Cranky the mean old gator and Allie, CrankyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s girlfriend (for nowÃ¢â‚¬Â¦). Richly-detailed graphics and animation bring Swampy and his subterranean world to life. 

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ AMAZING LIFE-LIKE WATER PHYSICS 
Go with the flow! From the designer of JellyCarÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s squishy world comes flawlessly fluid physics. Swipe, slosh, and splash to guide water through increasingly challenging scenarios. 

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ COLLECTIBLES AND BONUS LEVELS 
Collect SwampyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s shower items to unlock bonus levels. Collect all the rubber duckies and tap around for even more surprises! 

Every drop counts in WhereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s My Water? Ã¢â‚¬â€ A refreshing new puzzler filled with good clean gaming fun!

Also, look for the new free version of WhereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s My Water with exclusive levels not found in the full game.
